alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 4:56PM CST until November 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... North central Rankin County in central Mississippi... South central Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 456 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Youngton, or 16 miles northwest of Clinton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brownsville around 500 PM CST. Flora and Pocahontas around 505 PM CST. Jackson and Annandale around 515 PM CST. Madison, Canton, and Gluckstadt around 520 PM CST. Ridgeland around 525 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and west central Mississippi.
